descriptionHtml:
Name: Spark
Category; Companions
Version: 1.0
Date: 2012/19/07



------------------- [This is what? ] -----------------------

Howdy everybody, 

Please try this mod if you like it. 
Mod adds the Wood Elf girl named Spark (devoted to Mr.Sapkovski and his \"Witcher\" Saga)
Spark is a marksman armed with Levelled Best Bow and Dagger.
Calculated Level from 5 to 70
Non-Essential!!!
Morality: Any crime (haha!) 
She also can be married.



--------------------[Where to meet her?]---------------------

She is waiting for you in \'Bee and Barb\' in Riften



------------------- [Install] -----------------------
Please copy and overwrite in the \\ Skyrim DATA folder 
NMM is recommended.
Put the checkmark at the SNSpark.esp in your launcher or NMM 

Just delete the esp.file to uninstall the mod

------------------- [Requirements] -----------------------
IMPORTANT! YOU MUST HAVE APACHI SKYHAIR V1.3

Other mods you need for proper appearance

Better Females by Bella http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=2812
The Eyes Of Beauty http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=13722
RANs Eyebrow Replacer http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=5812
RANs Eyeliner Replacer http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=5701
UNP Female Body http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=6709 (also CBBE of course if you use Caliente`s awesome replacer!)
VAnilla Skin Texture v1-8 http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=6554

All cheers and credits go to the modders whose mods I`ve used

-------------------
How to uninstall
-------------------
Just delete the esp.file from the Data folder



-------------------
Bugs
-------------------
Black face bug is possible in some cases but I haven`t met it so far...


------------------- [Licensing / Legal] -------------
Feel free to modify, just give me credit.
Thank you for all moder Bezesuda and made a great game


Enjoy!
Sandraniks
author: Sandraniks
